tool_description: Send letters and cards, handwritten by robots.
name: Addressable
title: Addressable

api_list.name: Create Message Templates
api_list.description: Creates a Message Template to use in Custom Notes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://addressable.p.rapidapi.com/message_templates.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "addressable.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create & Send a Mailer
api_list.description: Creates a handwritten Letter or Card and marks it as ready to print.
api_list.code:
